Texts.Chs: 有意思。这种液体可以恢复机甲的能量，而不是引起负面效果。
Texts.Eng: Curious. This liquid appears to be restoring your mechs energy, rather than causing negative effects.

Texts.Chs: 危险！黯灵液正在迅速地把你的机器变成布丁！快点从这里出去！
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Essentia Obscura is rapidly turning your mech into pudding! Get out swiftly!

Texts.Chs: 危险！硫酸已经破坏了你的机甲镀层。我建议你立刻离开。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Sulphuric acid has compromised your mech plating. I suggest leaving the liquid immediately.

Texts.Chs: 危险！这种液体可以使机甲系统短路。我们应该尽快离开这里。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! This fluid is rapidly shorting out every system on board the mech. We should leave this liquid soon or risk death.

Texts.Chs: 危险！毒水看起来已经渗入了机甲组件，造成了严重的损坏。你应该尽快离开这里。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! This poisonous water seems to seep into your mechs components and cause serious issues. You should get out sooner than later.

Texts.Chs: 危险！机甲温控系统正在逐渐失效！请立即撤退！
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mech's temperature control systems are failing! Evacuate immediately!

Texts.Chs: 危险！液氮正在迅速冻结机甲的伺服系统和组件！这并不是好事。请尽快撤退，否则你会后悔的。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mechs servos and components are rapidly freezing within the liquid nitrogen. That isn't a good thing. Evacuate soon or you will know regret.

Texts.Chs: 敌对实体也存在于零重力环境中。我的宇航员记录显示，击败它们可能会得到一个厄尔吉斯电池，你的机甲可以吸收这个电池来补充耐久和燃料。
Texts.Eng: Hostile entities also exist in zero-gravity environments. My cosmonautical records indicate that defeating them may result in obtaining an erchius battery, which your mech can absorb to replenish health and fuel.

Texts.Chs: 现在试着把这些杂碎清理掉。试着^#FF1493;跳跃^reset;和^#FF1493;践踏^reset;前方的生物。
Texts.Eng: Now try throwing your mass around. Try to ^#FF1493;leap and ^#FF1493;stomp^reset; on the creatures ahead.

Texts.Chs: 请注意你的机甲的^#bf2fe2;燃料储备^white;和^#1d8e25;耐久^white;，^green;两者分别可视化为机甲上方的彩色条^white;。随着时间的推移，^#bf2fe2;燃料条^white;会耗尽，当机甲受到伤害时，^#1d8e25;耐久条^white;会被损耗。
Texts.Eng: Please be aware of your mech's ^#bf2fe2;fuel^white; and ^#1d8e25;health^white; reserves, visualised respectively as the ^green;colored bars you can see above your vehicle^reset;. The ^#bf2fe2;fuel^white; will deplete over time and the ^#1d8e25;health^white; bar will deplete when the mech takes damage.

Texts.Chs: 记住，你可以在你的^orange;改造台^reset;上制作一个^orange;机甲修理工具^reset;，并且在^orange;工具升级站^reset;升级使其更加有效。
Texts.Eng: Remember, you can create a ^orange;Mech Repair tool^reset; at your ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; and upgrade it to be more effective at a ^orange;Tool Upgrade Station^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^#orange;三度仪^reset;可以帮助你对你的机甲^orange;更换装备^reset;和^orange;加油^reset;。燃料很重要，所以保持机甲燃料充足。任务之后请在三度仪里面检查相应的按钮 ^#Red;(如果你看到“unauthorized user”，请重新开始任务。)。
Texts.Eng: The ^#orange;Tricorder^reset; can help you ^orange;equip^reset; and ^orange;refuel^reset; your mech. Fuel is important, so keep your mech topped up. Press the corresponding buttons on the tricorder after this mission to check it out. ^#Red;(If you see 'unauthorized user' restart the mission.)

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：你的机体无法承受此处的^#00BFFF;寒冷^reset;！
无视此警告可能导致驾驶员死亡或车辆保修失效。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#00BFFF;cold^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified

Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs: 欢迎来到你的新机甲！在我们开始之前，如果你想从你面前的板条箱里收取物资的话，按^#FF1493;[E]^reset;退出机甲。这些物资以后会派上用场的。
Texts.Eng: Welcome to your new mech! Before we begin, if you want to collect the goods from the crates in front of you, exit the mech by pressing ^#FF1493;[E]^reset;. These supplies will come in handy later.

Texts.Chs: 你的机甲可以按^#FF1493;[DOWN]^reset;进行躲避，或者^#FF1493;[双击方向键]^reset;朝你走的方向冲刺。
Texts.Eng: Your mech can ^#FF1493;duck by pressing ^#FF1493;[DOWN]^reset;, or ^#FF1493;sprint with a ^#FF1493;[double-tap]^reset; in the direction you are walking.

Texts.Chs: 当你的机甲在有重力的环境中，你可以^#FF1493;双击[UP]键^reset;以手动从地面移动切换到飞行模式。我建议你在这里继续驾驶你的机甲。
Texts.Eng: Your mech switches to a ground-movement configuration when in an environment with gravity, you can manually switch from ground-movement to flight-Mode ^#FF1493;double tapping the [UP] key^reset;. I would advise you continue to proceed in your mech.

Texts.Chs: 如果需要的话，你的机甲将自动蹲伏，以适应它可以通过的狭小空间。例如在这一段设施的顶部。
Texts.Eng: Your mech will auto-crouch to fit into areas that it can pass, should the need arise. Such as at the top of this passage.

Texts.Chs: 零重力战斗要比平地上的更为棘手。精度是至关重要的，因此你需要学会正确引导你的目标。
Texts.Eng: Zero gravity combat is a bit trickier than on flat ground. Accuracy is important, so you'll need to learn to lead your targets properly.
